name: Timer.Root
description: Used to record the time elapsed from zero or since a specified target time.
description_zh: Used to record the time elapsed from zero or since a specified target time.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

autoStart.description: Whether the timer should start automatically
autoStart.description_zh: 计时器是否应自动启动

countdown.description: Whether the timer should countdown, decrementing the timer on each tick.
countdown.description_zh: 计时器是否应该倒计时，在每个时钟周期上递减计时器。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the timer parts

interval.description: The interval in milliseconds to update the timer count.
interval.description_zh: 更新计时器计数的间隔（以毫秒为单位）。

startMs.description: The total duration of the timer in milliseconds.
startMs.description_zh: 计时器的总持续时间（以毫秒为单位）。

targetMs.description: The minimum count of the timer in milliseconds.
targetMs.description_zh: 计时器的最小计数（以毫秒为单位）。

events.name: complete
events.description: Function invoked when the timer is completed
events.description_zh: 计时器完成时调用的函数

events.name: tick
events.description: Function invoked when the timer ticks
events.description_zh: 计时器滴答作响时调用的函数
